name: psr1basf
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), c2))

stmt.origin: eleq2s(c0, c1, co(c2, cmap, co(cn0, cmap, c1o)), wf(c0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, co(c2, cmap, co(cn0, cmap, c1o))), wf(c0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), c2))
-| wceq(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(cn0, cmap, c1o)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, co(c2, cmap, co(cn0, cmap, c1o))), wf(c0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), c2))
-| wceq(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(cn0, cmap, c1o)))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c2, cmap, co(cn0, cmap, c1o))), wf(c0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), c2))
-| wceq(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(cn0, cmap, c1o)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(cn0, cmap, c1o)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cps1, c4))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cps1, c4))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))

comment: Univariate power series base set elements are functions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Mar-2015.)
